title: AFK in an entire ranked match
body: Riot thinks that a 4 v 5 game is fair. plain and simple they don't give a crap about the people who lose from AFK's the whole game and with no loss prevention is unfair! Rectify it.

replies.body: And people don't care about the games they win 5v4! Everyone always says that 4v5's happen more often, but that is mathematically impossible. For every game lost because of an afk or troll or feeder, 5 people benefit and 4 people don't. Statistically you will be a part of that 5 person group 20% more often than the 4. So if you're gonna argue for loss prevention, then they should implement win prevention as well
Because they know when someone is going to have connection issues or afk in ever game before the game starts. Logic 101 boys.

Mate I'm 100% against what the OP said, but your logic is worse than his. What does knowledge before the game have to do with anything he said? A loss prevented would be applied on completion of the game, not beforehand. He's suggesting some sort of automated detection of an afk player in game that would hit the 'loss prevent' switch
